Kingdom of God - Study Overview The purpose of this study is to find out all about Kingdom of God prepare a checklist that anyone can use for self-introspection find practical ways to qualify Why is it important to study about the Kingdom of God The simple answer is we are asked to do so - But seek ye first the kingdom of God, and his righteousness; and all these things shall be added unto you Mt 6: 33 . But a nice side benefit is that we have all our needs covered. As 'all things' in the above verse refers to the worries of life and body Mt 6: 25 . Specifically, what to eat, what to drink, and what to wear Mt 6: 31 . Greek word

docs.text: Parables about kingdom Why did Jesus speak in parables? And he said unto them, Unto you it is given to know the mystery of the kingdom of God: but unto them that are without, all these things are done in parables: Mk 4: 11 And with many such parables spake he the word unto them, as they were able to hear it. Mk 4: 33 But without a parable spake he not unto them: and when they were alone, he expounded all things to his disciples. Mk 4: 34 Parable of Weeds Another parable put he forth unto them, saying, The kingdom of heaven is likened unto a man which sowed good seed in his field Mt 13: 24 The field is the world; the good seed are the children of the kingdom; but the tares are the children of the wicked one; - Mt 13: 38 The Son of man shall send forth his angels, and they shall gather out of his kingdom all things that offend, and them which do iniquity; - Mt 13: 41 Parable of Mustard seed He told them another parable: “The kingdom of heaven is like a mustard seed, which a man took and planted in his field. Though it is the smallest of all seeds, yet when it grows, it is the largest of garden plants and becomes a tree, so that the birds come and perch in its branches. Mt 13 : 31 , 32 And he said, Whereunto shall we liken the kingdom of God? or with what comparison shall we compare it? It is like a grain of mustard seed, which, when it is sown in the earth, is less than all the seeds that be in the earth: But when it is sown, it groweth up, and becometh greater than all herbs, and shooteth out great branches; so that the fowls of the air may lodge under the shadow of it. Mk 4 : 30 , 31 , 32 Parable of the leaven Another parable spake he unto them; The kingdom of heaven is like unto leaven, which a woman took, and hid in three measures of meal, till the whole was leavened. Mt 13: 33 Parable of treasure Again, the kingdom of heaven is like unto treasure hid in a field; the which when a man hath found, he hideth, and for joy thereof goeth and selleth all that he hath, and buyeth that field. Mt 13: 44 Parable of pearls Again, the kingdom of heaven is like unto a merchant man, seeking goodly pearls: Mt 13: 45 Parable of net Again, the kingdom of heaven is like unto a net, that was cast into the sea, and gathered of every kind: Mt 13: 47 Parable of unforgiving servant Therefore is the kingdom of heaven likened unto a certain king, which would take account of his servants. Mt 18: 23 Parable of vineyard workers For the kingdom of heaven is like unto a man that is an householder, which went out early in the morning to hire labourers into his vineyard. Mt 20: 1 Parable of the banquet The kingdom of heaven is like unto a certain king, which made a marriage for his son, Mt 22:2 Parable of ten virgins Then shall the kingdom of heaven be likened unto ten virgins, which took their lamps, and went forth to meet the bridegroom. Mt 25: 1 Secretly growing seed And he said, So is the kingdom of God, as if a man should cast seed into the ground; Mk 4: 26

docs.text: Kingdom of God Is "Kingdom of God" real or an abstract concept The bible seem to refer to Kingdom of God to: Something in the future Daniel prophesised that the God of heaven will set up a kingdom which shall never be destroyed Dan 2: 44 And he shall reign over the house of Jacob for ever; and of his kingdom there shall be no end. Lk 1: 33 Jesus wouldn't have asked us to pray Thy Kingdom come Mt 6: 10 if it was not in the future But I say unto you, I will not drink henceforth of this fruit of the vine, until that day when I drink it new with you in my Father's kingdom. Mt 26: 29 , Mk 14: 25 For thine is the kingdom, and the power, and the glory, for ever - Mt 6: 13 Something that is near Repent ye: for the kingdom of heaven is at hand. - Mt 3: 2 , Mt 4: 17 But if I cast out devils by the Spirit of God, then the kingdom of God is come unto you - Mt 12: 28 Something that is already there for a while Then shall the King say unto them on his right hand, Come, ye blessed of my Father, inherit the kingdom prepared for you from the foundation of the world: Mt 25: 34 Are there other kingdoms? Yes. Kingdoms of the world Devil ... sheweth him all the kingdoms of the world, and the glory of them Mt 4: 8 And the devil, taking him up into an high mountain, shewed unto him all the kingdoms of the world in a moment of time. Lk 4: 5 Nation will rise against nation, and kingdom against kingdom. Mt 24: 7 , Mk 13: 8 And he(Herod) sware unto her, Whatsoever thou shalt ask of me, I will give it thee, unto the half of my kingdom Mk 6: 23 Kingdom of David Blessed be the kingdom of our father David, that cometh in the name of the Lord: Hosanna in the highest. Mk 11: 10 Kingdom of satan And if Satan cast out Satan, he is divided against himself; how shall then his kingdom stand? - Mt 12: 26 What are the properties of "Kingdom of God" Dan 2: 44 It is near/at hand It has a gospel/good news that is worth sharing/preaching There is hierarchy in the kingdom Whosoever therefore shall break one of these least commandments, and shall teach men so, he shall be called the least in the kingdom of heaven: but whosoever shall do and teach them, the same shall be called great in the kingdom of heaven - Mt 5: 19 Verily I say unto you, Among them that are born of women there hath not risen a greater than John the Baptist: notwithstanding he that is least in the kingdom of heaven is greater than he. Mt 11: 11 At the same time came the disciples unto Jesus, saying, Who is the greatest in the kingdom of heaven? Mt 18: 1 Whosoever therefore shall humble himself as this little child, the same is greatest in the kingdom of heaven Mt 18: 4 For I say unto you, Among those that are born of women there is not a greater prophet than John the Baptist: but he that is least in the kingdom of God is greater than he. Lk 7: 28 There are qualifications to enter the kingdom more info Outside the kingdom is darkness But the children of the kingdom shall be cast out into outer darkness: there shall be weeping and gnashing of teeth - Mt 8: 12 It suffers violence And from the days of John the Baptist until now the kingdom of heaven suffereth violence, and the violent take it by force Mt 11: 12 It is evident by the works of the Spirit of God But if I cast out devils by the Spirit of God, then the kingdom of God is come unto you - Mt 12: 28 It has mysteries He answered and said unto them, Because it is given unto you to know the mysteries of the kingdom of heaven, but to them it is not given. Mt 13: 11 And he said unto them, Unto you it is given to know the mystery of the kingdom of God: but unto them that are without, all these things are done in parables: Mk 4: 11 One can be instructed Then said he unto them, Therefore every scribe which is instructed unto the kingdom of heaven is like unto a man that is an householder, which bringeth forth out of his treasure things new and old. Mt 13: 52 It has keys And I will give unto thee the keys of the kingdom of heaven: and whatsoever thou shalt bind on earth shall be bound in heaven: and whatsoever thou shalt loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven. Mt 16: 19 It has right and left spots in the throne Grant that these my two sons may sit, the one on thy right hand, and the other on the left, in thy kingdom - Mt 20: 21 It can be taken away Therefore say I unto you, The kingdom of God shall be taken from you, and given to a nation bringing forth the fruits thereof. Mt 21: 43 It can be shut up But woe unto you, scribes and Pharisees, hypocrites! for ye shut up the kingdom of heaven against men: for ye neither go in yourselves, neither suffer ye them that are entering to go in. Mt 23: 13 General principles of the kingdom A divided kingdom falls Every kingdom divided against itself is brought to desolation Mt 12: 25 And if Satan cast out Satan, he is divided against himself; how shall then his kingdom stand? - Mt 12: 26 And if a kingdom be divided against itself, that kingdom cannot stand - Mk 3: 24 Is the kingdom an abstract concept or real? Is the kingdom already amidst us? But if I cast out devils by the Spirit of God, then the kingdom of God is come unto you - Mt 12: 28 Is the kingdom moving towards us or we moving to the kingdom? Repent ye: for the kingdom of heaven is at hand. - Mt 3: 2 Repent: for the kingdom of heaven is at hand. - Mt 4: 17 What are the direct commands with respect to the Kingdom of God? Pray Thy Kingdom come Mt 6: 10 Seek it Mt 6: 33

docs.text: How to seek the Kingdom of God But seek ye first the kingdom of God, and his righteousness; and all these things shall be added unto you Mt 6: 33 . Jn 7: 11 God asked Ananias to inquire for Saul - Acts 9: 11 They looked for Jesus asking one another - Isn't he coming? - Jn 11: 56 Disciples asked one another what it meant - Jn 16: 19 Desiring/Planning/Scheming/Looking for a way Herod seeks to kill the child -
